title: Processes - Determine Limit Using Alg Manipulation

content.question: <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 0, of, the fraction with numerator 1 minus, the cosine squared of, open parenthesis, 2 x, close parenthesis, and denominator open parenthesis, 2 x, close parenthesis, squared, end fraction, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>cos</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
